  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Teoremas fundamentales del cálculo diferencial</string>
            <string language="en">Fundamental theorems of differential calculus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Theoreme der Differentialrechnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Théorèmes fondamentaux de calcul différentiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorems fundamentais do cálculo diferencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoremi fondamentali del calcolo differenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεμελιώδη θεωρήματα του διαφορικού υπολογισμού</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los teoremas de Rolle y del Valor Medio para funciones derivables en un intervalo. También se desarrollan numerosos ejercicios de aplicación de los teoremas a casos concretos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach Rolle's theorem and the mean value theorem for functions which are differentiable in an interval. It also includes many exercises which apply the theorems to particular cases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">intervalo</string>
            <string language="en">interval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema</string>
            <string language="en">theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema del valor medio</string>
            <string language="en">mean value theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">continua</string>
            <string language="en">continuous</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Rolle</string>
            <string language="en">Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">derivable</string>
            <string language="en">differentiable</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Theorem Rolles und das Mittelwerttheorem für Funktionen
zu unterrichten, welche in einem Abstand differenzierbar sind. 
Er schließt auch viele Übungen ein, die die Theoreme an den 
bestimmten Fällen anwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner le théorème de Rolle et le théorème de 
valeur moyenne pour des fonctions ce qui sont différentiables dans un
intervalle. Il inclut également beaucoup d'exercices qui 
s'appliquent les théorèmes aux cas particuliers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar o 
theorem de Rolle e o theorem do valor médio para funções quais são
differentiable em um intervalo. Inclui também muitos 
exercícios que aplicam os theorems aos casos particulares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare teorema del Rolle ed il teorema di valore medio per le 
funzioni quale sono differenziabili in un intervallo. Egualmente
include molte esercitazioni che applicano i teoremi ai casi 
particolari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει το θεώρημα Rolle και το θεώρημα μέσης αξίας για
τις λειτουργίες που είναι differentiable σε ένα διάστημα. 
Περιλαμβάνει επίσης πολλές ασκήσεις που εφαρμόζουν τα 
θεωρήματα στις ιδιαίτερες περιπτώσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittelwerttheorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ununterbrochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rolle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
